user_question: What are the key differences between roguelike and roguelite games, and can you generate an image of a fictional roguelike game character?
final_answer: Roguelike games are characterized by turn-based gameplay, grid-based movement, and permanent death, often adhering to the Berlin Interpretation. Roguelites, on the other hand, incorporate some roguelike elements but are more forgiving, often featuring persistent progression. Image of a fictional roguelike game character generated.
